title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 114 - School Food Service Programs
content:

State Regulations
§ 114.1 - School breakfast program
§ 114.2 - Food service management contracts
§ 114.3 - Bidding exemption for purchasing New York State food
§ 114.4 - Bidding exemption for the direct purchasing of milk
§ 114.5 - Prohibition against meal shaming

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. E, pt. 114

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 305; L. 1976, ch. 537 as amd. by L. 1980, ch. 798; L. 1993, ch. 57, § 389, ch. 260, §§ 31, 32, chs. 614, 615

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
